Package kareltherobot

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Directions
    Directions implements the direction names and also the infinity value for the number of beepers carried by a robot.
    RobotTask
    Used by the KarelRunner subsystem.
    UrRobot.ConnectStrategy  
    WorldBuilderInterface

    Class Description
    AugmentedRobot  
    AutoRemote  
    AutoRemoteMain  
    BeeperConfiguration  
    Die  
    Directions.Direction  
    FigureMaker  
    KarelRunner
    Used to run robot programs flexibly from the command line.
    KJRTest
    Title: KJRTest
    MiniBuilder
    A world builder suitable for use in Applets.
    RemoteControl
    Instantiating this class will create a robot and a remote control panel to control it.
    Robot
    Robot defines the sensing capabilities of Robot objects.
    RobotWorldWindow  
    UrRobot
    The most basic kind of robot.
    World
    Build and maintain the world in which Robots work and play.
    WorldBuilder
    A world builder is a dialog with facilities for manipulating all aspects of a world.
